name: Dream (itch) (AlexNaie)
description:
What would you do if you are stuck in a DREAM ? How can you wake up ?

 You wake up in a dream and quick enough you realize you have to escape it and wake up. That's when you start having the urge to go on the top of the building to jump off of it! Till there you will have to get trough a few puzzles and challenges so buckle up and enjoy what we made during four no-sleep days!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Q - Push
  • Mouse - Look

Created by NaBoo studio in a 4 day sprint for the Weekly Game Jam 130.
